judges: Justices DONOHUE and WECHT did not participate in the consideration or decision of this matter.

PERELMAN; Dilworth Paxson, LLP: Joseph Jacovini; Lawrence McMichael; Marjorie Obod; Ronald Perelman; Haines & Associates; Clifford E. Haines; Buckley, Brion, McGuire, Morris & Sommer LLP; Andrew C. opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 22nd day of June, 2016, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal and Application for Leave to File Reply Brief are DENIED.
Justices DONOHUE and WECHT did not participate in the consideration or decision of this matter.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.
